name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Python Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience in developing high-performance applications across the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **Python**, **FastAPI**, and **microservices**, with hands-on expertise in building REST and gRPC APIs, utilizing **OpenAPI** for documentation. Skilled in containerization with **Docker** and **Docker Compose**, and experienced in orchestration with **Kubernetes**.
Deep understanding of Machine Learning principles, with experience in AI/ML platforms and integrating **GenAI**, **LangChain**, and **LangGraph** technologies. Demonstrated capability in deploying applications on **AWS** services such as **S3**, **EC2**, **Lambda**, and **API Gateway**, and in CI/CD processes using **Git**, **GitHub Actions**, and **AWS CodePipeline** alongside infrastructure as code with **Terraform** and **CDK**.
Strong advocate of software engineering best practices, compliance-driven development, and aligning solutions with industry standards. Known for delivering innovative solutions through automation and predictive analytics, while maintaining a focus on quality and performance.

Implemented seamless **REST** and **gRPC** APIs with OpenAPI specifications, resulting in improved communication between services and reduced latency by **25%** in data retrieval operations.
Integrated **CI/CD** pipelines leveraging **GitHub Actions** and AWS CodePipeline, achieving a **30%** increase in deployment efficiency and continuous integration of features with automated testing and error handling.
Led the design and implementation of machine learning algorithms and operations, utilizing tools like **LangChain** and **GenAI**, enhancing data processing efficiency and model deployment time by **40%**.
Managed cloud resources using **Terraform** and CDK for automated infrastructure provisioning, reducing manual setup time by **50%** across development and production environments.
Conducted in-depth code reviews and mentoring sessions in **English** at a B2/C1 level to align team practices with high standards and to enhance collaborative software development efforts.
Developed user-centric API functionalities facilitating seamless integration for external partners and enhancing user experience by incorporating feedback-driven improvements.
Utilized modern frameworks and libraries to ensure responsive and performant web applications, adhering to design principles and best practices in code quality.
Streamlined backend processes using efficient data retrieval techniques and optimizing existing databases for query performance, demonstrating proficiency with SQL and NoSQL solutions.
